verses.text: \w After|strong="H5927"\w* Saul \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w returned|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5927"\w* pursuing \w the|strong="H5927"\w* Philistines, \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* told, “\w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w is|strong="H8033"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* wilderness \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w En-gedi|strong="H5872"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w took|strong="H1961"\w* three thousand chosen men \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H7725"\w* Israel \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w went|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w look|strong="H2009"\w* \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* men \w in|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* region \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* Rocks \w of|strong="H4057"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* Wild Goats.

Soon \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w came|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sheepfolds \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* road, \w where|strong="H5921"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cave, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* relieve \w himself|strong="H6440"\w*.\f + \fr 24:3 \ft Literally cover his feet, a euphemism for relieving oneself\f* \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* hiding \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* recesses \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* cave.

\w So|strong="H3427"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s men said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, “\w This|strong="H1732"\w* \w is|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* day \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w which|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, ‘Behold, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H7272"\w* deliver \w your|strong="H5921"\w* enemy \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* hand, \w that|strong="H1732"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w may|strong="H7272"\w* \w do|strong="H1870"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H3427"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* wish.’” \w Then|strong="H7586"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* crept \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w secretly|strong="H7586"\w* \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w cut|strong="H7272"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* corner \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*’s robe.

Afterward, \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s conscience \w was|strong="H3068"\w* stricken \w because|strong="H3027"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w corner|strong="H3671"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*’s \w robe|strong="H4598"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w said|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w men|strong="H3772"\w*, “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* forbid \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w should|strong="H1732"\w* \w do|strong="H3671"\w* \w such|strong="H3651"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w thing|strong="H3651"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1732"\w* master, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s anointed. \w May|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* never lift \w my|strong="H1732"\w* hand \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w since|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H3651"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s anointed.”

\w With|strong="H3068"\w* \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w David|strong="H3027"\w* restrained \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w let|strong="H7971"\w* \w them|strong="H7971"\w* rise \w up|strong="H6213"\w* \w against|strong="H3027"\w* \w Saul|strong="H1931"\w*. \w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w Saul|strong="H1931"\w* \w left|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* cave \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w went|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w way|strong="H1697"\w*.

\w After|strong="H6965"\w* \w that|strong="H1697"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w cave|strong="H4631"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* called \w out|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, “\w My|strong="H5414"\w* lord \w the|strong="H5414"\w* king!” \w When|strong="H6965"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* looked behind \w him|strong="H5414"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* bowed facedown \w in|strong="H3212"\w* reverence

\w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H3651"\w* \w do|strong="H3318"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w* listen \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* words \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w men|strong="H7121"\w* \w who|strong="H4428"\w* say, ‘\w Look|strong="H5027"\w*, \w David|strong="H1732"\w* intends \w to|strong="H3318"\w* harm \w you|strong="H4480"\w*’?

\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w this|strong="H1697"\w* day \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* seen \w with|strong="H1697"\w* \w your|strong="H8085"\w* own eyes \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* delivered \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w into|strong="H1697"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* hand \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* cave. \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w told|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* kill \w you|strong="H4100"\w*, \w but|strong="H2009"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* spared \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w and|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, ‘\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w will|strong="H1697"\w* \w not|strong="H8085"\w* lift \w my|strong="H8085"\w* hand \w against|strong="H1697"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* lord, \w since|strong="H2009"\w* \w he|strong="H1732"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s anointed.’

\w See|strong="H7200"\w*, \w my|strong="H5414"\w* father, \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* corner \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* robe \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* cut \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w See|strong="H7200"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* know \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* evil \w or|strong="H3808"\w* rebellion \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*. \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* sinned \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* hunting \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w down|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w life|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w May|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* judge \w between|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w may|strong="H5315"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* vengeance \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w against|strong="H2398"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w As|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* old proverb says, ‘Wickedness proceeds \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* wicked.’ \w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w against|strong="H4480"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w Against|strong="H3027"\w* whom \w has|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* king \w of|strong="H3027"\w* Israel \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*? Whom \w are|strong="H3027"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* pursuing? \w A|strong="H3068"\w* dead dog? \w A|strong="H3068"\w* flea?

\w May|strong="H4310"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w our|strong="H3318"\w* judge \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w decide|strong="H3318"\w* between \w you|strong="H7291"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w me|strong="H3318"\w*. \w May|strong="H4310"\w* \w He|strong="H3478"\w* \w take|strong="H3318"\w* notice \w and|strong="H3478"\w* plead \w my|strong="H3318"\w* case \w and|strong="H3478"\w* deliver \w me|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w your|strong="H3318"\w* hand.” David’s Oath to Saul

\w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w David|strong="H3027"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* finished saying these \w things|strong="H1961"\w*, Saul called back, “\w Is|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* voice, \w David|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* son?” \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* Saul wept aloud

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, “\w You|strong="H1696"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w more|strong="H1058"\w* righteous \w than|strong="H2088"\w* \w I|strong="H1697"\w*, \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* rewarded \w me|strong="H6963"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* good, though \w I|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* rewarded \w you|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H1696"\w* evil.

\w And|strong="H1732"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* shown \w this|strong="H3588"\w* day \w how|strong="H3588"\w* \w well|strong="H2896"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w dealt|strong="H1580"\w* \w with|strong="H1732"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*; \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* delivered \w me|strong="H4480"\w* \w into|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* hand, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H1580"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* kill \w me|strong="H4480"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H2896"\w* finds \w his|strong="H3068"\w* enemy, \w does|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w let|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w* \w go|strong="H3068"\w* away unharmed? \w May|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* reward \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H2896"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* know \w for|strong="H3588"\w* sure \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* king, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* kingdom \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Israel \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w established|strong="H6213"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* hands.

\w So|strong="H6965"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w swear|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w me|strong="H4427"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w cut|strong="H3478"\w* off \w my|strong="H3045"\w* descendants \w or|strong="H3027"\w* wipe \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* name \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* father’s house.”

\w So|strong="H6258"\w* David gave \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w oath|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Saul. \w Then|strong="H6258"\w* Saul returned \w home|strong="H1004"\w*, \w but|strong="H6258"\w* David \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w men|strong="H8034"\w* \w went|strong="H3068"\w* up \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* stronghold.
